case_title: ABDUR RAHMAN And Other vs ALLAH DITTA

inheritance_dispute.collector_decision: Land was self-acquired property of Mst. Bhakhan's father; descendants of Mst. Bhakhan have preferential right

revision_decision.decision: Inheritance given to reversioners on grounds of equity

review_decision.finding: Mst. Bhakhan was the original tenant; succession devolves under Section 21(a) of the Act
review_decision.order: Collector's decision restored in favor of sons and daughters of deceased tenant
